mapper.select: select distinct gu from sports s join location l on s.location_id = l.location_id where sport_name = #{sport_name} order by gu
select center_name from sports s join location l on s.location_id = l.location_id where flag = 1 and sport_name = #{sport_name} and gu = #{gu}
mapper.insert: insert into match_room(email,center_id,location_id, match_type, level, owner, count) values(#{email},#{center_id},#{location_id},#{match_type},#{level},#{owner},#{count})
mapper.select: select distinct s.location_id from sports s join location l on s.location_id = l.location_id where sport_name = #{sport_name} and gu = #{gu} and flag = 1

select room_id, center_name, gu, dong, adress, match_type, level, owner, user, count from match_room m join location l on m.location_id = l.location_id join sports s on m.center_id = s.center_id where m.location_id = #{location_id}
